author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Exxon Mobil, Boeing, Nvidia, Netflix, VeriFone, Monsanto
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Tuesday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Up 0.7%: A pair of Senate committees and a House of Representatives committee hold hearings on Tuesday and Wednesday regarding Facebook’s handling of user data.
